solution_line_template: The cost to fill a tank went up {original_cost_per_tank}*{price_increase_percent_decimal}=$<<{original_cost_per_tank}*{price_increase_percent_decimal}={cost_increase}>>{cost_increase}
So it cost {original_cost_per_tank}+{cost_increase}=$<<{original_cost_per_tank}+{cost_increase}={new_cost_per_tank}>>{new_cost_per_tank} to fill the tank
